info.title: Mii Installer
info.author: Waninkoko
info.description: Installs dumped Miis from your SD card
info.details:
Create a directory called "miis" in the root of a SD card.

Copy the Miis you want to install in the directory created in the previous step.

Run this application and all your Miis will be copied from the SD card to your Wii.
